reviews.text: I was in a jam trying to find a place to stay for my high school reunion. I called the Chester Manor and Monica (the manager) said that she thought she would have a room becoming available and she would call me and let me know. Was I ever surprised when she did!! I've never been called back by a hotel, and I've been in the travel industry for 30 years.
reviews.title: Great motel staff!

likes.liked: — The staff was amazing and the rooms quaint and clean
likes.disliked: — Smelled like cigarette smoke in a non-smoking room

reviews.title: AMERICANA
reviews.text: The motel is old, but very clean! My room was very spacious, with even a spare bedroom attached at the rear. Bathroom was a little small, but well configured and the shower was comfortable.
